name: Jaime L. Garcia
text: Both lead to inner peace, so it's like deciding whether to go left or right at a road fork when you are lost. Either way won't guarantee you will find your way, but both are steps in the right direction.    Honestly, I'd walk the path that is less troublesome for myself. (i.e. Case to case depending on yourself and circumstance).
